titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in public buildings.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Declares that nothing in the Constitution shall abridge the right of persons to participate in voluntary prayer in public buildings.
